actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill relating to the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Kentucky.

summary.text: Provides that no instrumentality of the United States shall take any action involving the construction, upon or through any of the land comprising the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Kentucky, of an access road to the Zilpo Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill relating to the Pioneer Weapons Hunting Area in the Daniel Boone National Forest, Kentucky.
